overview: The contact page for Digital Experience Healthcare provides navigation, contact information, and a form submission interface with success and error banners. It includes accessibility features, theme toggling, and structured content for user inquiries.
key_components: Sticky navigation bar with theme toggle
Hero section with title and subtitle
Contact form (implied but not shown in snippet)
interactions: Click skip-to-content link to jump to main content
Toggle dark/light theme via theme-toggle button
Navigate between pages using navbar links
Submit contact form to trigger success or error banners
data_flow: User fills contact form and submits
Frontend validates input and sends data to backend endpoint (not shown)
On success, hides form and displays success banner
On failure, displays error banner with retry guidance
accessibility: ARIA roles for navigation and alerts
aria-labels on interactive elements (theme toggle, banner close)
test_ideas: Verify skip-to-content link focuses main content
Validate navbar links navigate correctly and active state updates
Test theme toggle persists preference across reloads
Submit valid form and assert success banner visibility and aria-live announcement
Submit invalid form and assert error banner visibility
Ensure banner close buttons hide banners and restore focus appropriately
Check all interactive elements have accessible names and roles
Confirm analytics events fire on key interactions
